Alex and Jon run bespoke EEG workshops tailored to fit the needs of attendees. We've successfully run several in the past the details or which can be found below. We have broad experience in a number of EEG systems and analysis techniques.

If you'd like us to run a workshop for your lab, group or company please [get in touch](ContactUs.qmd)

-   Standard attendee: £700
-   Student/post-doc: £350

## Expertise

Between us we experience in using the following EEG systems for data collection:

-   [Brain Products](https://www.brainproducts.com/index.php)
-   [BioSemi](https://www.biosemi.com/)
-   [Electrical Geodesics Inc. ](https://www.egi.com/)
-   [Neuroscan](http://compumedicsneuroscan.com/)

We are also have experience in the following analysis softwares:

-   [BESA](http://www.besa.de/)
-   [Brain Vision Analyzer ](http://www.brainproducts.com/downloads.php?kid=9)
-   Neuroscan -- Edit
